string-array.name: movie_desc
string-array.item: The Avengers, is a 2012 American superhero film \nbased on the Marvel Comics superhero team of the \nsame name.
Hundreds of years in the future, the last surviving\nhumans discover a way of sending consciousness \nback through time.
Brooklyn Nine-Nine is an American police procedural \ncomedy television series that aired on Fox, and later \non NBC.
Queen Ramonda, Shuri, M\'Baku, Okoye and the Dora Milaje fight to protect their nation from intervening world powers in the wake of King T\'Challa\'s death.\n

Ted 2 (stylized as ted2) is a 2015 American comedy 
film directed by Seth MacFarlane, from a script 
written by MacFarlane, Alec Sulkin, and 
Wellesley Wild.
JJ Shaft, a cyber security expert with a degree from \nMIT, enlists his family\'s help to uncover the truth \nbehind his best friend\'s untimely death.
Disaster strikes when a man invites his dream girl to \nan island resort, but a previous blind date with the \nsame name shows up instead.
A New York cop and his wife go on a European \nvacation to reinvigorate the spark in their marriage.
